word_mean: 抗氧化剂，阻氧化剂：被广泛应用的合成或天然物质，加入一种产品中，可阻止或延迟空气中氧的破坏作用。橡皮、油漆、植物油及食物制品常含有抗氧化剂
延缓或防止脂肪氧化的添加剂。

sentence.Network_en: Such compounds might be considered as a special type of antioxidant and classified as inhibitor regenerators.

sentence.Network_en: Xanthophyll from the marigold flower is a potent antioxidant.

entry.tran: 抗氧（化）剂；阻氧化剂；防老（化）剂
entry.def: An antioxidant is a substance which slows down the damage that can be caused to other substances by the effects of oxygen. Foods which contain antioxidants are thought to be very good for you.

means.word_mean: 1. substance that inhibits oxidation or inhibits reactions promoted by oxygen or peroxides

auth_sentence.content: Curcumin has both antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.
